definitions: To extract (ore or coal, for example) from the earth.
To dig a mine or mines.
To obtain something from a mine.
To lay explosive mines in (an area of land or water).
To delve into (a source of information) to extract information.
examples: They mine for gold in the mountains.
The company plans to mine a new seam of coal.
The engineers will mine the harbor for enemy ships.
We need to mine the data for useful insights.
